text: If a judge of the Superior Court of the District of Columbia determines that public policy or the physical condition of either of the persons applying for a marriage license requires the intended marriage to be celebrated without delay, he may waive the provisions of § 46-409, and a license may be issued without regard to such sections.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 30-118.

1973 Ed., § 30-120.

Effect of Amendments

D.C. Law 17-222 substituted "§ 46-409" for "§§ 46-409 and 46-417".

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 17-222, see notes following § 46-403.

DC CODE § 46-418

Current through December 11, 2012
